name: Frontend
description: This is a complete override theme plugin for plentymarkets online stores.
author: Alexander Kolbfleisch

dataProviders.name: First item list
dataProviders.description: Display a configurable list of items in your online store

dataProviders.name: Second item list
dataProviders.description: Display a configurable list of items in your online store

dataProviders.name: Third item list
dataProviders.description: Display a configurable list of items in your online store

containers.name: Template: Style
containers.description: Add style to plentyShop LTS with a theme plugin.

containers.name: Template: Override style
containers.description: Override the default CSS file of plentyShop LTS.

containers.name: Script loader: Register/load JS
containers.description: Register scripts, events and other JS related items.

containers.name: Script loader: After scripts loaded
containers.description: Load scripts, events and other JS related items, e.g. Vue components, after frameworks and scripts have been initialised.

containers.name: Page Design: After opening HTML body tag
containers.description: Add content after the opening HTML body tag.

containers.name: Page Design: After opening HTML head tag
containers.description: Add content after the opening HTML head tag.

containers.name: Static Pages: Cancellation rights
containers.description: Add additional content on the cancellation rights page.

containers.name: Static Pages: Cancellation form
containers.description: Add additional content on the cancellation form page.

containers.name: Static Pages: Legal disclosure
containers.description: Add additional content on the legal disclosure page.

containers.name: Static Pages: Privacy policy
containers.description: Add additional content on the privacy policy page.

containers.name: Static Pages: Terms and conditions
containers.description: Add additional content on the terms and conditions page.

containers.name: Override homepage
containers.description: Override the complete homepage.

containers.name: Header: Override header
containers.description: Override the complete header of all pages.

containers.name: Header: Left header container
containers.description: Add content to the container on the left in the header.

containers.name: Footer: Override footer
containers.description: Override the complete footer of all pages.

containers.name: Single item: Before "Add to shopping cart" button
containers.description: Add content before the 'Add to shopping cart' button in the single item view.

containers.name: Single item: After "Add to shopping cart" button
containers.description: Add content after the 'Add to shopping cart' button in the single item view.

containers.name: Single item: Override image carousel
containers.description: Override the image carousel on the single item.

containers.name: Single item: After scripts loaded
containers.description: Load scripts, events and other Javascript related items, such as Vue components, after frameworks and scripts have been initialised on the single item view.

containers.name: Single item: Styles
containers.description: Load CSS in the head after all other styles have been loaded.

containers.name: Shopping cart: Before "Value of items"
containers.description: Add content before the value of items in the Total column of the shopping cart.

containers.name: Shopping cart: After "Value of items"
containers.description: Add content after the value of items in the Total column of the shopping cart.

containers.name: Shopping cart: Before "Shipping"
containers.description: Add content before the shipping costs in the Total column of the shopping cart.

containers.name: Shopping cart: After "Shipping"
containers.description: Add content after the shipping costs in the Total column of the shopping cart.

containers.name: Shopping cart: Before "VAT"
containers.description: Add content before the VAT in the Total column of the shopping cart.

containers.name: Shopping cart: After "VAT"
containers.description: Add content after the VAT in the Total column of the shopping cart.

containers.name: Shopping cart: Before "Total"
containers.description: Add content before the total sum in the Total column of the shopping cart.

containers.name: Shopping cart: After "Total"
containers.description: Add content before the total sum in the Total column of the shopping cart.

containers.name: Shopping cart items list: Before item
containers.description: Add content before the item in the Items list of the shopping cart.

containers.name: Shopping cart items list: After item
containers.description: Add content after the item in the Items list of the shopping cart.

containers.name: Shopping cart: Before basket totals
containers.description: Add content before the basket totals in the shopping cart.

containers.name: Shopping cart: After basket totals
containers.description: Add content after the basket totals in the shopping cart.

containers.name: Shopping cart overlay: Extend buttons
containers.description: Add additional content to the 'add to basket overlay' buttons.

containers.name: Shopping cart preview: Before basket totals
containers.description: Add content before the basket totals in the shopping cart preview.

containers.name: Shopping cart preview: After basket totals
containers.description: Add content after the basket totals in the shopping cart preview.

containers.name: Shopping cart preview: Before "Checkout" button
containers.description: Add content before the 'Checkout' button in the shopping cart preview.

containers.name: Shopping cart preview: After "Checkout" button
containers.description: Add content after the 'Checkout' button in the shopping cart preview.

containers.name: Checkout: Override checkout
containers.description: Override the complete checkout page.

containers.name: Checkout: Override invoice address control
containers.description: Override the invoice address control in the checkout. The containers 'Before invoice address' and 'After invoice address' will also be overridden.

containers.name: Checkout: Before invoice address
containers.description: Add content before the invoice address control in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: After invoice address
containers.description: Add content after the invoice address control in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: Override shipping address control
containers.description: Override the shipping address control in the checkout. The containers 'Before shipping address' and 'After shipping address' will also be overridden.

containers.name: Checkout: Before shipping address
containers.description: Add content before the shipping address control in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: After shipping address
containers.description: Add content after the shipping address control in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: Override shipping method
containers.description: Override the list of shipping methods in the checkout. The containers 'Before shipping method' and 'After shipping method' will also be overridden.

containers.name: Checkout: Before shipping method
containers.description: Add content before the list of shipping methods in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: After shipping method
containers.description: Add content after the list of shipping methods in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: Override payment method
containers.description: Override the list of payment methods in the checkout. The containers 'Before payment method' and 'After payment method' will also be overridden.

containers.name: Checkout: Before payment method
containers.description: Add content before the list of payment methods in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: After payment method
containers.description: Add content after the list of payment methods in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: Opt-ins
containers.description: Add content to opt-in checkboxes in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: Before basket totals
containers.description: Add content before the basket totals in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: After basket totals
containers.description: Add content after the basket totals in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: Before "Order now" button
containers.description: Add content before the 'Order now' button in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: After "Order now" button
containers.description: Add content after the 'Order now' button in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: Address field container
containers.description: Add content, e.g. one or multiple custom address fields, at the bottom of the address form.

containers.name: Checkout: After scripts loaded
containers.description: Load scripts, events and other Javascript related items, such as Vue components, after frameworks and scripts have been initialised in the checkout.

containers.name: Checkout: Styles
containers.description: Load CSS in the head after all other styles have been loaded.

containers.name: Order confirmation: Additional shipping information
containers.description: Add additional shipping information to the order details on the order confirmation page.

containers.name: Order confirmation: Additional payment information
containers.description: Add additional payment information on the order confirmation page.

containers.name: Order confirmation: Override gross/net prices
containers.description: Override the gross/net prices on the order confirmation page.

containers.name: My account: Additional payment information
containers.description: Add additional payment information after the order information on the My account page.

containers.name: Category item list: Before prices container
containers.description: Add content before the prices in the category item view.

containers.name: Category item list: After prices container
containers.description: Add content after the prices in the category item view.

containers.name: Category item list: Container below side navigation
containers.description: Add content below the side navigation bar in the category item view.

containers.name: Login overlay: Container in a row with the buttons
containers.description: Add content in the login overlay.

containers.name: Registration overlay: Container in a row with the buttons
containers.description: Add content in the registration overlay.

containers.name: Search: Override search filters
containers.description: Override search filters in item lists and search results.

containers.name: Search: Override the search bar
containers.description: Override the search bar in the header.
